Activity: Check emails and respond to any outstanding inquiries from team members. Review the updated project plan.

Follow up with @ehrv-1 and @dba-1 regarding the data access permission issue reported by @da-1 and @da-2. Escalate the issue if necessary to ensure timely resolution. @ehrv-1, @dba-1 Topic: Urgent Follow-up on Data Access Permissions.

Review the preliminary data analysis plan with @pchmp-1 (Physician Champion) and @clinlead-1 to ensure the analysis aligns with clinical priorities and objectives. Refine the plan based on their feedback. @pchmp-1, @clinlead-1 Topic: Review of Data Analysis Plan.

Monitor the data abstraction progress of @da-1 and @da-2. Check in with them to see if they are encountering any challenges and provide support as needed. Email: @da-1, @da-2 Topic: Data Abstraction Progress Check-in.

Meet with @mrs-1 and @mrs-2 (Medical Records Specialists) to discuss strategies for identifying and retrieving relevant medical records, especially in cases where electronic records are incomplete or unavailable. @mrs-1, @mrs-2 Topic: Medical Record Retrieval Strategies.
Review the data quality assurance process with @qatest-1 and @qatest-2. Check in to see their progress and provide assistance as needed. @qatest-1, @qatest-2 Topic: Data Quality Assurance Progress.
Prepare a progress report for senior management summarizing the progress made on the influenza data abstraction and analysis project. Highlight any key challenges and proposed solutions.
Document today's activities and update the project plan with progress made. Review the plan for tomorrow and identify any outstanding tasks.
